summary:
Cute nord for Companionship and marriage.
Works with CBBE, UNP, Coverwomen, Unvision and many more
Based in Morthal\'s Moorside Inn. Custom player house friendly.
2 Options - with or without her own warpaint tattoo
descriptionHtml:
Sylvia - nord custom NPC follower - works with all body/face mods

This is the final version of Sylvia, there will not be any updates or new look options, and i am no longer taking requests for optional looks.

I am sorry to inform, but i have been away from Skyrim since september 2012 and i am no longer providing support for my mods.
If you read the description and follow all requirements there should not be any problems at all.

Thank you for understanding and for all endorsements.

She is the 19th girl from Sir BravoOskar\'s collection of custom followers ;)
well actually the 2nd, but didn\'t release her till now. I have been using her as a testing NPC and photo model for a long time so now its time to share :)

2 options - with her own tattoo or without, don\'t worry the tattoo is standalone so she is the only girl in Skyrim with that tattoo.
It is strongly recommended to install the tattoo version manually
---------------------------------------------------
!!!PLEASE READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION!!!
---------------------------------------------------
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8172/7911054812_e6e987df62_z.jpg[/img]

this is an auto-level up version with an iron dagger wearing miner\'s clothes.
she will level up same as player up to lvl120
If you want to take her base clothing, best use UFO or Extensible Follower Framework both have options to command your follower
to change or take it off or give option to remove it from inventory, read their description about how-to.

She is a Follower and Marriage NPC

<Requires: ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 from the \"OTIONAL\" files of apachii downloads [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]LINK[/url]
<NO need for any DLC, but she works fine with Dawnguard too

>Location:
Moorside Inn in Morthal. Best way to get there if you are new to the game is by using the carriage by Whiterun stables.
She is custom player house friendly, means she will stay and play wherever you dismiss her and will not return to Morthal.

>Description and class:
this is not an edited vanilla NPC this is an EXTRA one and she is essential (cannot die)
Follower NPC addon, standalone, marriable
She is a combat assassin one-handed preferred and bow/crossbow preferred, but she can dual wield one-handed if the dual wield doesn\'t work use this mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13571 (dual wield for followers)
Weight: 75 Height: 0.98 (coz she is a nord and would be too tall for my taste)

only spell she has is healing

No need for any body/face mods, but any should work fine.


>mods used for screenshots:

Coverwomen look #1 from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]LINK[/url]

eyes of beauty from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]LINK[/url]

UNP & UNPBlessed from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]LINK[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]LINK[/url]

Lips and eyeliner textures from zzjay\'s epic elves from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20172]LINK[/url] (just the textures from the main file)

Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483]LINK[/url]

Princess of the woods from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008]LINK[/url] and retexture from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23626]LINK[/url]

Bandolier bags and pouches from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]LINK[/url] and/or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22119]LINK[/url]

UNP boots 02 from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22732]LINK[/url]

Castle Orlok from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23246]LINK[/url]

The white dress is a very old mod i don\'t have any link for it or for the jewellery used with it, sorry.


>Strongly recommended:

Lively Followers from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23796]LINK[/url] to make her behave like Serana from DG dlc and not just standing around when idle. this mod makes your follower interact with the world around by them selves.


All my followers are compatible with UFO, extensible followers and convenient horses mods

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Note: On some screenshots editing software has been used, if a screenshot has been edited you will see a signature BravoOskar on the bottom right.
       Some screenshots taken when using Stakado Cinemascope ENB from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15425]HERE[/url]
       and realistic lightning from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7654]HERE[/url] , some without.
       The warpaint used on her is my own design using vector graphics, specially designed for this NPC.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
She works with all body and face mods (tested)
Note: this npc\'s looks are not editable and do not use the setnpcweight command
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

please report bugs if you find some, but it should work perfectly, i tested it myself.
if you have any problems please upload images here, coz if i cannot see it i may won\'t be able to help

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-installation: unpack and drop the .esp and .bsa files in skyrim/data folder
MAKE SURE you installed both bsa and esp files before contacting me of any visual bugs.
MAKE SURE she is the last in the load order after any mods/dlcs.

-uninstallation: delete the Sylvia.esp and .bsa and if using warpainted version delete the femaleheadwarpaint_21 from the folder data/textures/actors/character/character assets/tintmasks


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
conflicts and bugs: none known

Notes:
-NPC EDITOR warning: adding custom hairs, items, armor on NPCs using NPC editor will cause double IDs means multiple selections in race menu and/or forge menu. Remember this if you would like to change her looks or attributes yourself.
-before contacting me that you cannot find her, open the console and write - help sylvia 0
and that should then show her name and id, if not, it means the game doesn\'t load her at all, so check your game launcher (not NMM) and that you have installed her properly
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/About_endorsements][b][i]Have fun and don\'t forget to endorse if you like it[/b][/i][/url]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
My follower mods (what\'s left on nexus): just click on a picture for the link

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14219][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/14219-1-1344467034.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15095][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/15095-1-1334437040.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16179][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/16179-1-1335796393.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21544][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/21544-1-1345045679.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23904][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23904-1-1347223279.jpg[/img][/url]

Sylvia\'s tattoo set moders resource:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23362][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23362-1-1346364730.jpg[/img][/url]

Easy NPC creation tutorial:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23972][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/23972-1-1347330673.jpg[/img][/url]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Credits:
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and Dawnguard DLC

Biggest Thanks goes to all the patient moders out there who delivered all the great mods and do their best to keep Skyrim growing.

BravoOskar 09/september/2012
